doc.name: revZipOpenArchives
doc.summary: Lists the currently open zip archives.

examples.example:
if tArchive is among the lines of revZipOpenArchives() then
beep
end if

description.p: Use the revZipOpenArchives function if you need to know the paths of the archives that have been loaded using revZipOpenArchive.
The revZipOpenArchives function returns a list of absolute file paths, one per line, or empty if no archives are open.
